description: These kaomojis are running for various reasons. Some are running away from bombs, one’s running away from a dog, one’s running in a hurdle race. Some are even chasing money. My favourite one is the chasing after the balloon it accidentally let go. Hopefully it can catch it!   ●~*＼(-_＼)・・・ε=ε=ε=┏(;-_-)┛ ●~* ε≡≡≡ﾍ(;￣▽￣)ﾉ εε===(⊃$∀$)⊃ーーーーー[ $ $ $ ] εε===(⊃$∀$)⊃ーーーーー[￥￥￥] 。。°°┏┓。。ﾍ( ^0^)ﾉ┏┓　　┏┓　　┏┓ ヾ(;ﾟ皿ﾟ)ﾉ･･･ ⊆￣U)┬┬ﾉ~”　=3 =3 ○～　　　　　　　　　　 ＼(゜口゜｜｜＼) (￣ー￣〃)ﾉヽ(･_･、)))))))) (*ﾉД｀)ﾉ:.*:.｡.:ﾟ..:*.:ヾ(´Дヽ*) ε≡ ε≡ ε≡ ε＝ （#・ж・） ⊂(( っ☉ω☉)っ　　～εїз (/´Д｀)/Heeeeeeeelp!!!!!　!!Σ(ﾟДﾟ;≡≡≡≡≡ヾ(;ﾟдﾟ)/ ～♥（ﾉ´∀`）ﾉ田　ε=ε=ε=Γ（ｌｌｌ`Д´ｌｌｌ）」 Hedgehogs These are hedgehog emojis that are running. These running emoticons are made in a Sonic the Hedgehog style. Just as you will see in the other animal category, ੯ makes the perfect nose for a hedgehog. It makes it look like it is moving towards the left, so the dust trails being left behind a running hedgehog need to go on the right. ੯ू•́ू ໒꒱⁼³₌₃ ੯”ړ ও͞=͟͟͞͞=͟͟͞͞=͟͟͞͞=͟͟͞͞=͟͟͞͞=͟͟͞͞ ੯”ཻړ ა͞=͟͟͞͞=͟͟͞͞=͟͟͞͞=͟͟͞͞=͟͟͞͞=͟͟͞͞
title: Running Because of Reasons
